Package controller

Class AdminViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.AdminViewController

  • public class AdminViewController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the controller method for the admin view. It has a list view that shows all of the accounts that have been created. It also has buttons to add users, to delete users, and to log out of the admin account.
    Author:
    Brian Schillaci, Kevin Jamunar

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage mainstage)
        Loads the CreateAccountController and associates the delete user button and logout button with click events. If the delete user button is clicked, the user is removed from the users object and the ListView is refreshed. If the logout button is clicked the current user is logged out and the loginViewController is loaded
        Parameters:
        mainstage - - loads the main stage of the program

      • getAllUsers

        public void getAllUsers​()
        sets the users object to the list of all users

      • refreshList

        public void refreshList​()
        refreshes the list of users and sets the refreshed list to the userListView
